description: Second-to-last day in Tokyo - favorite districts and final experiences

activities.description: Shinjuku ‚Üí Golden Gai: Short walk from Shinjuku Station East Exit through Kabukicho district to Golden Gai

üçã Visit OpenBook Tokyo - Famous lemon sour bar in Shinjuku Golden Gai serving 'the world's best lemon sour' made with brown sugar shochu, domestic lime syrup, and Hiroshima lemons. Literary atmosphere with books from the late Kojimasa Tanaka (90 minutes)
activities.notes: No signboard, 3rd shop from outside on Golden Gai Street No. 5. Open 8pm-midnight daily. Check Google Maps for directions.

reservations.name: OpenBook Tokyo
reservations.description: Legendary lemon sour bar in Shinjuku Golden Gai - famous for 'world's best lemon sour' with literary atmosphere and books from late author Kojimasa Tanaka
reservations.location: Shinjuku Golden Gai Street No. 5, Tokyo
reservations.notes: No signboard, tiny 3-tsubo shop. Open 8pm-midnight. Check Instagram for updates. Google Maps: https://maps.app.goo.gl/6GRfLQjsAHoAT72N7

reservations.name: Home in Shinjuku City
reservations.description: Private room in Shinjuku hosted by Okamoto - 7 minutes walk to Shinjuku Gyoen, near station, clean private room perfect for sightseeing, continuing stay from December 8th

meals: Breakfast: Local cafe, Lunch: Tsukiji/Ginza, Dinner: Special restaurant
notes: Make the most of the second-to-last day. Visit any missed attractions and enjoy final Tokyo experiences.
